dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
DSQSS is a program package for solving quantum many-body problems
defined on lattices. It is based on the quantum Monte Carlo method in
Feynman's path integral representation.
dependent_to.name: dsqss

dependent_to.description:
Floating-point Litmus Tests (FLiT) is a C++ test infrastructure for
detecting variability in floating-point code caused by variations in
compiler code generation, hardware and execution environments.
dependent_to.name: flit

dependent_to.description:
autopep8 automatically formats Python code to conform to the PEP 8 style
guide.
dependent_to.name: py-autopep8

dependent_to.description: Testing coverage checker for python
dependent_to.name: py-coverage

dependent_to.description: Dom's tools for Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language.
dependent_to.name: py-dom-toml

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.
dependent_to.name: py-flit

dependent_to.description: Distribution-building parts of Flit.
dependent_to.name: py-flit-core

dependent_to.description: Units and constants in the HEP system of units.
dependent_to.name: py-hepunits

dependent_to.description: A ASGI Server based on Hyper libraries and inspired by Gunicorn.
dependent_to.name: py-hypercorn

dependent_to.description:
ipdb is the iPython debugger and has many additional features, including
a better interactive debugging experience via colorized output.
dependent_to.name: py-ipdb

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts
dependent_to.name: py-jupytext

dependent_to.description: Optional static typing for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-mypy

dependent_to.description: NiTransforms -- Neuroimaging spatial transforms in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-nitransforms

dependent_to.description: PennyLane is a Python quantum machine learning library by Xanadu Inc.
dependent_to.name: py-pennylane

dependent_to.description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.
dependent_to.name: py-pre-commit

dependent_to.description: Python docstring style checker.
dependent_to.name: py-pydocstyle

dependent_to.description: python code static checker
dependent_to.name: py-pylint

dependent_to.description: Parser for 'pyproject.toml'
dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-parser

dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest

dependent_to.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.
dependent_to.name: py-python-benedict

dependent_to.description:
Advanced Python dictionaries with dot notation access Box will
automatically make otherwise inaccessible keys safe to access as an
attribute. You can always pass conversion_box=False to Box to disable
that behavior. Also, all new dict and lists added to a Box or BoxList
object are converted automatically.
dependent_to.name: py-python-box

dependent_to.description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-quart

dependent_to.description: Use git repo data for building a version number according PEP-440
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-git-versioning

dependent_to.description: Setuptools rust extension plugin.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-rust

dependent_to.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependent_to.description: A Python bindings generator for C/C++ libraries.
dependent_to.name: py-sip

dependent_to.description: Open source library for continuous-variable quantum computation
dependent_to.name: py-strawberryfields

dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-streamlit

dependent_to.description: Python module that wraps system calls to rsync.
dependent_to.name: py-sysrsync

dependent_to.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.
dependent_to.name: py-tox

dependent_to.description: yq takes YAML input, converts it to JSON, and pipes it to jq
dependent_to.name: py-yq

description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git
name: py-toml

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
